::: {.lead}
I made these resources mainly in Indonesian to increase accessibility for Indonesians wanting to learn about infectious disease modelling. I tried my best to attribute sources within each materials. 

For html materials, please right-click then Save Link As (untuk materi bertipe html, klik kanan pada link lalu Save Link As).

1. [Introduction to programming with R (Pengantar pemrograman dengan R)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andradjaafara/intro_to_R/main/intro_to_R_bimandra_djaafara.html)


:::
